title: #174: Drug Kurtel (@KurtMetzger, @KerenMargolis, Winston, @AriShaffir
itunes:title: Drug Kurtel with Kurt Metzger
description: Kurt Metzger had me over to his apartment in Harlem to talk about drugs. Kurt has always been that one friend that everybody has who can always find anything you're looking to do. From weed, to pills, to coke, Kurt has always been able to find it. And he's tried everything. Keren Margolis picks up the mic from time to time, too.
